product_name: GSI Outdoors Commuter Java Press Mug
long_description: The GSI Outdoors Commuter Java press mug cleverly eliminates the intrusive plunger rod found on classic French press designs and instead uses an inner mug with a filter on the bottom. Add coffee grounds to the outer mug, pour in hot water, and then push the inner mug down into the outer mug, letting the grounds steep to make the perfect cup of coffee. Spill-resistant, flip-top lid seals in heat and prevents your sloshing drink from escaping yet unscrews easily when you need to add sugar or cream. Inner/outer mug design also creates a double wall of insulation to keep drink hot while you're camping or on your way to work; recycled-neoprene sleeve adds extra insulation. Slim profile fits in many car cup holders so your coffee and tea can travel with you. The GSI Outdoors Commuter Java press is shatter resistant and 100% BPA free.
short_description: The GSI Outdoors Commuter Java press mug cleverly eliminates the intrusive plunger rod found on classic French press designs and instead uses an inner mug with a filter on the bottom.
